menu - Variable in class MyPaint
 
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class MyCanvas
listener for mouse clicked if crating figures left clicks adds points right click stops action right click if inside of figure sets it's as active figure and a color menu will open if in editing active figure by left clicking inside active shape might be in moving state right click stops action if in moving active figure by left clicking you stop moving it
mouseDragged(MouseEvent) - Method in class MyCanvas
 
mouseEntered(MouseEvent) - Method in class MyCanvas
 
mouseExited(MouseEvent) - Method in class MyCanvas
 
mouseMoved(MouseEvent) - Method in class MyCanvas
if creating figure will update it's shape in moving active figure will update it's coordinates
mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class MyCanvas
 
mouseReleased(MouseEvent) - Method in class MyCanvas
 
mouseWheelMoved(MouseWheelEvent) - Method in class MyCanvas
if in editing state enables rescaling active figure

MyCanvas - Class in <Unnamed>
Menu class extends Canvas and implements listeners for mouse movement Contains all shapes and state of program
MyCanvas() - Constructor for class MyCanvas
Constructor of canvas adds listeners for mouse movement Parameters: appState 'c' > creating circle 'r' > creating rectangle 't' > creating triangle '0' > no action 'e' > editing active figure shapes - list of all shapes activeShape - index of active shape painting: equals '0' when no new points have been painted equals '1' when 1 point of new figure has been painted equals '2' when 1 point of new figure has been painted (only for triangle) moving - equals true if moving active figure movingPoint - coordinates of point from which we move figure
MyMenu - Class in <Unnamed>
Menu class extends JMenuBar changes type of figure that can be created enables saving and opening files
MyMenu(MyPaint) - Constructor for class MyMenu
Constructor of menu
MyPaint - Class in <Unnamed>
Main class of application simple graphic editor enabling to create shapes, changing their color, modifying their placement and size on canvas.
MyPaint() - Constructor for class MyPaint
MyPaint extends JFrame has menu and canvas
MyRectangle - Class in <Unnamed>
Rectangle has parameters as integer table (rect[0] = first point, rect[1] = second point, rect[2] = wight & height) and color
MyRectangle(int[], int[], Color) - Constructor for class MyRectangle
Constructor of rectangle
MyShapes - Class in <Unnamed>
abstract class enabling having one array of all shapes is extended by
MyShapes() - Constructor for class MyShapes
